mapper.select: select A.* from PA_PAYSERVICE A LEFT JOIN PAYSERVICE B ON A.PAYSERVICE_ID = B.PAYSERVICE_ID where A.IS_USE = 1 and B.PAY_TYPE = 0 and A.PATIENT_ID = #{pId} union all select S.* from PA_PAYSERVICE S LEFT JOIN PAYSERVICE C ON S.PAYSERVICE_ID = C.PAYSERVICE_ID where S.IS_USE = 3 and C.PAY_TYPE = 1 and S.PATIENT_ID = #{pId} and CONVERT(varchar(100), S.END_DATE, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100),GETDATE(), 23) and CONVERT(varchar(100),GETDATE(), 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100),S.BEG_DATE, 23)
select top 1 * from PA_PAYSERVICE where PATIENT_ID = #{patientId} and PAYSERVICE_ID = #{payServiceId} and IS_USE = 0 order by PP_ID DESC

SELECT A.PAYSERVICE_ID AS proId,A.BEG_DATE AS startDate,A.PP_ID AS id, B.NAME AS proName,B.PAY_TYPE AS payType,A.UNIT_PRICE AS unitPrice FROM PA_PAYSERVICE A LEFT JOIN PAYSERVICE B ON A.PAYSERVICE_ID = B.PAYSERVICE_ID where A.PATIENT_ID = #{pId} and A.IS_USE = 1 and B.PAY_TYPE = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE PA_PAYSERVICE SET UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice},BEG_DATE = #{begDate} where HOSP_NUM = #{hospNum} and PATIENT_ID = #{patientId} and PAYSERVICE_ID = #{payserviceId} and is_use = '1'
